original_title: En Este Momento Las Cataratas Están Sonando
overview: After an unfortunate comment, a young woman decides to go on a trip to the Iguazu Falls. Her search is to find a never-before-seen image of said landscape, but in the course of it, her story will take the viewer on a path of reflections on time, photography and human behavior.
title: En Este Momento Las Cataratas Están Sonando
